security.loggedInDeviceDesc: Information of the devices that you are logged into.
security.notMyDevice: In case that devices are not yours.

enhanceModal.title: Reinforce device security
enhanceModal.desc: Be careful of devices you don't recognize, someone else might have stolen your account. Protect your account by changing your password.
enhanceModal.caution: You will be logged out of all devices except the one you are currently using.
